SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.board

Class Playground

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.board.Playground
public class Playground extends Object
Representation of the player's playground. The playground contains a representation of card's disposition and manages their positioning. It also saves and updates player's resources and score.

  • Method Details

    • getArea

      public Map<Position,Tile> getArea()

    • getTile

      public Tile getTile(Position pos)
      Returns the tile at the position pos.
      Parameters:
      pos - the position of the tile.
      Returns:
      the tile at position pos or null if there isn't a tile in that position.

    • sameAvailability

      public boolean sameAvailability(Position pos, Availability availability)
      Returns true if the tile at position pos has the same availability as availability. If pos is null, or it's not contained in area, the method returns false.
      Parameters:
      pos - the position of the Tile to check.
      availability - the availability to compare to the one in the Tile at position pos.
      Returns:
      true if the tile at position pos has the same availability as availability.

    • contains

      public boolean contains(Position position)
      Checks if there is a Tile in at specific position.
      Parameters:
      position - the position of the Tile to check.
      Returns:
      true if the playground contains a tile in that position.

    • getAllPositions

      public Set<Position> getAllPositions()
      Returns all the position in the playground.
      Returns:
      a set which contains all the position in which there's a tile.

    • getResources

      public Map<Symbol,Integer> getResources()
      Returns all the player's resources.
      Returns:
      a map containing for each resource symbol the specific amount owned by the player.

    • getPoints

      public int getPoints()
      Returns the player current score.
      Returns:
      an integer representing player's current score.

    • setPoints

      public void setPoints(int points)
      Sets the value of the points.
      Parameters:
      points - the updated value of the points owned by the player.

    • getAvailablePositions

      public List<Position> getAvailablePositions()
      Returns all the available positions.
      Returns:
      a list containing all the positions stored in the playground associated to an empty tile.

    • getOccupiedPositions

      public List<Position> getOccupiedPositions()
      Returns all the occupied positions.
      Returns:
      a list containing all the positions stored in the playground associated to an occupied tile.

    • getCornersBeingCoveredByTheTileAt

      public Map<Position,CornerPosition> getCornersBeingCoveredByTheTileAt(Position position)
      Gets the corner covered for each position adjacent to position.
      Parameters:
      position - the position of the tile from which the adjacent positions are taken.
      Returns:
      a map from each adjacent position to the corner covered.

    • getAdjacentOccupiedPositions

      public List<Position> getAdjacentOccupiedPositions(Position position)

    • placeCard

      public void placeCard(Face c, Position p) throws Playground.UnavailablePositionException, Playground.NotEnoughResourcesException
      Places a card's face in the playground.
      Parameters:
      c - the face that is placed in the playground.
      p - the position where the face is placed.
      Throws:
      Playground.UnavailablePositionException - if the position it's unavailable or already occupied.
      Playground.NotEnoughResourcesException - if the player doesn't have enough resources to place the card's face.
